00005 #include "PVNode.h"

00007 float PVNode::m_angle =   1.0;
00008 float PVNode::m_maxH =  65.0;
00009 float PVNode::m_minH  = -65.0;
00010 float PVNode::m_maxV =  75.0;
00011 float PVNode::m_minV =   0.0;
00012 
00013 PVNode::PVNode(const String &name, SceneNode *node, Entity *entity)
00014 :
00015 m_name(name),
00016 m_node(node),
00017 m_entity(entity),
00018 m_position(Vector3::ZERO),
00019 m_velocity(Vector3::ZERO),
00020 m_acceleration(Vector3::ZERO),
00021 m_yaw(0.0),
00022 m_pitch(0.0)
00023 {
00024  m_node->pitch(Degree(m_pitch));
00025 }
00026 
00027 PVNode::~PVNode()
00028 {
00029 }

00031 void PVNode::setPosition(const Ogre::Vector3 &p)
00032 {
00033  m_node->setPosition(p);
00034 }

00036 void PVNode::setAcceleration(const Ogre::Vector3 &a)
00037 {
00038  m_acceleration = a;
00039 }

00041 void PVNode::setVelocity(const Ogre::Vector3 &v)
00042 {
00043  m_velocity = v;

00047 Vector3 PVNode::getOrientation()
00048 {
00049  m_orientation = m_node->getOrientation() * Vector3(0.0, 0.0, -1.0);
00050  return m_orientation;
00051 }
00052 
00053 Vector3 PVNode::getNormal()
00054 {
00055  Vector3 position = this->getPosition();
00056  Vector3 normal = Vector3(-position.x, position.y, -position.z);
00057  return normal.normalisedCopy();
00058 }
00059 
00060 void PVNode::translateNode(Vector3 trans)
00061 {
00062  m_node->translate(trans);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void PVNode::rotateNode(Direction dir)
00066 {
00067  m_node->setOrientation( Quaternion(1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0) );
00068  switch (dir) {
00069   case UP: if ( (m_pitch +=  m_angle) >= m_maxV ) m_pitch = m_maxV; break;
00070   case DOWN: if ( (m_pitch -=  m_angle) <= m_minV ) m_pitch = m_minV; break;
00071   case LEFT: if ( (m_yaw +=  m_angle) >= m_maxH ) m_yaw = m_maxH; break;
00072   case RIGHT: if ( (m_yaw -=  m_angle) <= m_minH ) m_yaw = m_minH; break;
00073   default:
00074    break;
00075  }
00076  m_node->pitch( Degree( m_pitch ) );
00077  m_node->yaw( Degree( m_yaw ) );
00078 }
00079 
00080 void PVNode::setKanoneMaxLeft()
00081 {
00082  //m_node->pitch(Degree( m_minV));
00083  m_node->yaw(Degree(m_minH));
00084 }
00085 
00086 bool PVNode::hasAcceleration()
00087 {
00088  int value = this->m_acceleration[0] * this->m_acceleration[0] + this->m_acceleration[1] * this->m_acceleration[1] + this->m_acceleration[2] * this->m_acceleration[2];
00089  if ( value > 0) return true;
00090  return false;
00091 }
